Text: how about offering whoever wants to continue uploading the show will get a chance to kill bobo and get away with it.
Hey mothergoose, how do you in fact even record the show of xm/sirius? what programs and hardware do you use so future generations of cunts and motherfuckers can upload this shit?

I've messaged a few people with some specifics. There are probably archived forum posts that go into all the technical specifics - mines not the only way to record per se. Suffice to say there are / were only two XM units capable of a digital output (Polk or modified XMPCR) - couple it with an optical soundcard and scheduling / recording software of your choice (Replay AV for Windows for example). Convert from 44.1 wav to mp3 with razorlame, edit with mp3directcut.  Shit, maybe I can plan to do a how-to / toolkit torrent before December? Not a bad idea at all...
